Based on the configurations described above, our implementation of ResNet-18 achieved an accuracy of 66%. In 
contrast, FatNet's implementations, both with GPU and simulation of optics lagged in accuracy, resulting in 60%. 
However, FatNet implementation performs 8.2 times fewer convolution operations to reach this level of accuracy and 
does not require any dense layers for classification.
